ratings.comment: Jim Was a awesome professor, 10/10, would definitely take another class with him!

Jim is by far the best professor that I have ever had. He genuinely cares for his students and actively makes sure that each lecture gives students opportunities to share their thoughts and engage with the material. While his class was very reading heavy, the material was usually very relevant and not terribly boring.

Jim was an amazing professor who was very passionate about his teaching. There were a lot of readings for the class but none of the readings felt disconnected from the material. Overall, I really enjoyed the amount of discussion that was offered within the lecture and discussions about the readings that we had assigned outside of class.

One of the best professors I've had at UW-Madison. He is clearly knowledgeable on the topic and his lectures are excellent. Lengthy reading at times, but necessary for background. Though it was a big lecture, he knew nearly all of our names and created an environment for discussion. He is very approachable and ready to help his students succeed.
